divs: Sighting DetailsI was playing soccer with a couple of friends. I was fixing my shoe when I looked up to see this object flying through the sky. I really didnt know what to think I was just amazed. It was very fast. a glowing light just zooming through the air.It changed direction once then it flew right behind a cloud.I was in shock and really just amazed. I didnt know what to think of it.I lost sight of it because it flew behind a cloud and it was really dark.
Summary: {cak} It was fast, faster than anything I have seen! There were many aircrafts flying at the time. none were as fast as this ufo.
